bill_title: require maintenance and repair funding for new nonrevenue generating buildings or facilities at institutions of higher education.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require maintenance and repair funding for new nonrevenue generating buildings or facilities at institutions of higher education. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-51 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: For any nonrevenue generating building or facility approved by the Legislature pursuant to § 13-51-1, five cents of every dollar obtained for the building or facility from federal sources, donations, or any other sources, shall be held in a fund for the maintenance and repair of the institution's nonrevenue generating buildings and facilities. Section 2. That chapter 13-51 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Upon legislative approval of any building or facility as provided in section 1 of this Act, the amount of general funds appropriated through the General Appropriations Act for the next fiscal year shall be reduced on a one-time basis by the amount collected under section 1 of this Act. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
